unicef-ei2.def: General government final consumption expenditure (formerly general government consumption) includes all government current expenditures for purchases of goods and services (including compensation of employees). It also includes most expenditures on national defence and security, but excludes government military expenditures that are part of government capital formation.
unicef-ei2.name: Government Expenditure, as % of GDP
unicef-ei2.source: World Development Indicators. Last update: June 2021. IMF Government Finance Statistics. Last update: April 2021.
unicef-ei2.dataset: World Development Indicators. Last update: June 2021. IMF Government Finance Statistics. Last update: April 2021.
